DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether routine sterile gloving can lower contamination rates in blood culture.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Routine Sterile Gloving in Blood Culture
DOC.detailed_description: Because contamination during sampling for blood culture may interfere in interpreting the results of blood culture, lowering the contamination rates in blood culture is very important. According to current guideline, routine sterile gloving is not recommended. We hypothesized that routine sterile gloving can lower contamination rates in blood culture.
DOC.criteria: The patients in whom Blood culture is medically needed Blood sample is obtained through central venous catheter or arterial line No consent to this study
